ygData.subject: Re: but can they be looted????
ygData.msgSnippet: that was just my opinion....to me, i think it s like to get that stuff, you have to work your way up to (now 46) and get a group of ppl together to earn that
ygData.messageBody:
that was just my opinion....to me, i think it's like to get that stuff, you have to
work your way up to (now 46) and get a group of ppl together to earn that armor and
weapons....just my 2cp worth

Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> If people are worried about twinking why dont they just put a level limit
> on who can use it. That, to me, seems like it would help.
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
> On Thu, 12 Aug 1999, Mystik wrote:
>
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > well, most of the armor/weapons from fear plane are no drop (there are some
> > exceptions)....this keeps twinking down....won't see a lv 1 newbie running
> > around in full ethereal mist....or carrying a bladestorm
